casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Francisco J. Cruz (13737)

O’Connell, Schallee and Speae, Js.

Argued May 31 decision released June 27, 1995 Timothy C. Moynahan, with whom, on the brief, was Ronald J. Barba, for the appellant (defendant). Harry Weller, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and ElpedioN. Vitale, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
